forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain this morning...then scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain this morning. Scattered thunderstorms for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
